en.latex:
What is the value of \(b\), in
\( (x+b)(x-1)=x^2 + 3x - 4? \)
en.html:
What is the value of \(b\), in
\( (x+b)(x-1)=x^2 + 3x - 4? \)

af.latex:
Wat is die waarde van \(b\), in
\((x+b)(x-1)=x^2 + 3x - 4 \)
af.html:
Wat is die waarde van \(b\), in
\((x+b)(x-1)=x^2 + 3x - 4 \)

en.latex:
\( (x + b)(x - 1)=x^{2} - x + bx - b \)
\( \text{From the constant term we see that } b = 4 \)
\( \text{ We can check the } x \text{ term: } -x + 4x = 3x \)
en.html:
\( (x + b)(x - 1)=x^{2} - x + bx - b \)
\( \text{From the constant term we see that } b = 4 \)
\( \text{ We can check the } x \text{ term: } -x + 4x = 3x \)

af.latex:
\( (x + b)(x - 1)=x^{2} - x + bx - b \)
\( \text{Vanaf die konstante term kan ons sien } b = 4 \)
\( \text{ Ons kan die } x \text{ term toets: } -x + 4x = 3x \)
af.html:
\( (x + b)(x - 1)=x^{2} - x + bx - b \)
\( \text{Vanaf die konstante term kan ons sien } b = 4 \)
\( \text{ Ons kan die } x \text{ term toets: } -x + 4x = 3x \)

en.latex: What is the value of \( g \) , in \( (x-2)(x+g)=x^2 - 6x + 8 \) ?
en.html: What is the value of \( g \) , in \( (x-2)(x+g)=x^2 - 6x + 8 \) ?

af.latex: Wat is die waarde van \( g \) , in \( (x-2)(x+g)=x^2 - 6x + 8 \) ?
af.html: Wat is die waarde van \( g \) , in \( (x-2)(x+g)=x^2 - 6x + 8 \) ?

en.latex:
\( \begin{align} & (x - 2)(x + g) = x^{2} + gx - 2x - 2g \\&
\text{From the constant term we see that } \\&
-2g = 8 \\&
\text{therefore } g = -4 \\&
\text{ We can check the } x \text{ term : } -4x - 2x = -6x \end{align} \)
en.html:
\( \begin{align} & (x - 2)(x + g) = x^{2} + gx - 2x - 2g \\&
\text{From the constant term we see that } \\&
-2g = 8 \\&
\text{therefore } g = -4 \\&
\text{ We can check the } x \text{ term : } -4x - 2x = -6x \end{align} \)

af.latex:
\( \begin{align} & (x - 2)(x + g) = x^{2} + gx - 2x - 2g \\&
\text{Vanaf die konstante term kan ons sien dat } \\&
-2g = 8 \\&
\text{daarom } g = -4 \\&
\text{ Ons kan die } x \text{ term toets : } -4x - 2x = -6x \end{align} \)
af.html:
\( \begin{align} & (x - 2)(x + g) = x^{2} + gx - 2x - 2g \\&
\text{Vanaf die konstante term kan ons sien dat } \\&
-2g = 8 \\&
\text{daarom } g = -4 \\&
\text{ Ons kan die } x \text{ term toets : } -4x - 2x = -6x \end{align} \)

en.latex:
For which of these values of \( k \) will \( b \) be positive?
\( {-3 \ ; \ -1 ; \ 0 ; \ 3; \ 5} \)
en.html:
For which of these values of \( k \) will \( b \) be positive?
\( {-3 \ ; \ -1 ; \ 0 ; \ 3; \ 5} \)

af.latex:
Vir watter van hierdie waardes van \( k \) sal \( b \) positief wees?
\( {-3 \ ; \ -1 ; \ 0 ; \ 3; \ 5} \)
af.html:
Vir watter van hierdie waardes van \( k \) sal \( b \) positief wees?
\( {-3 \ ; \ -1 ; \ 0 ; \ 3; \ 5} \)

en.latex:
\( (x - 4)(x + k) = x^{2} + kx - 4x - 4k \)
The \(x\) term is \(kx - 4x\) so for \(b\) to be positive
\(k > 4 \)
\( \text{Therefore } k = 5 \)
en.html:
\( (x - 4)(x + k) = x^{2} + kx - 4x - 4k \)
The \(x\) term is \(kx - 4x\) so for \(b\) to be positive
\(k > 4 \)
\( \text{Therefore } k = 5 \)

af.latex:
\((x - 4)(x + k) = x^{2} + kx - 4x - 4k \)
Die \(x\) term is \( kx - 4x\) so vir \(b\) om positief te wees moet
\(k > 4 \)
\( \text{Dus } k = 5 \)
af.html:
\((x - 4)(x + k) = x^{2} + kx - 4x - 4k \)
Die \(x\) term is \( kx - 4x\) so vir \(b\) om positief te wees moet
\(k > 4 \)
\( \text{Dus } k = 5 \)

en.latex:
For which of these values of \( k \) will \( c \) be positive?
\( {-3 \ ; \ -1 ; \ 0 ; \ 3; \ 5} \)
en.html:
For which of these values of \( k \) will \( c \) be positive?
\( {-3 \ ; \ -1 ; \ 0 ; \ 3; \ 5} \)

af.latex:
Vir watter van hierdie waardes van \( k \) sal \( b \) positief wees?
\( {-3 \ ; \ -1 ; \ 0 ; \ 3; \ 5} \)
af.html:
Vir watter van hierdie waardes van \( k \) sal \( b \) positief wees?
\( {-3 \ ; \ -1 ; \ 0 ; \ 3; \ 5} \)

en.latex:
\( (x - 4)(x + k) 4=x^{2} + kx - 4x - 4k \)
\( \text{The constant term is } −4k \text{ so for } c \text{ to be positive } k < 0 \)
\( \text{Therefore } k = −3 \text{ or } k = −1 \)
en.html:
\( (x - 4)(x + k) 4=x^{2} + kx - 4x - 4k \)
\( \text{The constant term is } −4k \text{ so for } c \text{ to be positive } k < 0 \)
\( \text{Therefore } k = −3 \text{ or } k = −1 \)

af.latex:
\( (x - 4)(x + k) 4=x^{2} + kx - 4x - 4k \)
\( \text{Die konstante term is } −4k \text{ so vir } c \text{ om positief te wees moet } k < 0 \)
\( \text{Dus } k = −3 \text{ of } k = −1 \)
af.html:
\( (x - 4)(x + k) 4=x^{2} + kx - 4x - 4k \)
\( \text{Die konstante term is } −4k \text{ so vir } c \text{ om positief te wees moet } k < 0 \)
\( \text{Dus } k = −3 \text{ of } k = −1 \)

en.latex: Given that \( \left(x+ \dfrac{4}{x}\right)^2 = 14 \) , determine the value of \( x^2 + \dfrac{16}{x^2} \) without solving for \( x \) .
en.html: Given that \( \left(x+ \dfrac{4}{x}\right)^2 = 14 \) , determine the value of \( x^2 + \dfrac{16}{x^2} \) without solving for \( x \) .

af.latex: Gegewe dat \( \left(x+ \dfrac{4}{x}\right)^2 = 14 \) , bepaal die waarde van \( x^2 + \dfrac{16}{x^2} \) sonder om vir \( x \) op te los.
af.html: Gegewe dat \( \left(x+ \dfrac{4}{x}\right)^2 = 14 \) , bepaal die waarde van \( x^2 + \dfrac{16}{x^2} \) sonder om vir \( x \) op te los.

en.latex:
\( \left(x+ \frac{4}{x}\right)^2 = x^2 + 8 + \frac{16}{x^2} \)
Now we note that the above expression can also be written as \( x^2 + \dfrac{16}{x^2} + 8 \) . Since \( \left(x+ \dfrac{4}{x}\right)^2 = 14 \) we get:
\( \begin{align} & 14 = x^2 + 8 + \frac{16}{x^2} \\&
14 - 8 = x^2 + \frac{16}{x^2} \\&
6 = x^2 + \frac{16}{x^2} \end{align} \)
en.html:
\( \left(x+ \frac{4}{x}\right)^2 = x^2 + 8 + \frac{16}{x^2} \)
Now we note that the above expression can also be written as \( x^2 + \dfrac{16}{x^2} + 8 \) . Since \( \left(x+ \dfrac{4}{x}\right)^2 = 14 \) we get:
\( \begin{align} & 14 = x^2 + 8 + \frac{16}{x^2} \\&
14 - 8 = x^2 + \frac{16}{x^2} \\&
6 = x^2 + \frac{16}{x^2} \end{align} \)

af.latex:
\( \left(x+ \frac{4}{x}\right)^2 = x^2 + 8 + \frac{16}{x^2} \)
Nou merk ons op dat die bostaande uitdrukking ook as \( x^2 + \dfrac{16}{x^2} + 8 \) geskryf kan word. Aangesien \( \left(x+ \dfrac{4}{x}\right)^2 = 14 \) kry ons:
\( \begin{align} & 14 = x^2 + 8 + \frac{16}{x^2} \\&
14 - 8 = x^2 + \frac{16}{x^2} \\&
6 = x^2 + \frac{16}{x^2} \end{align} \)
af.html:
\( \left(x+ \frac{4}{x}\right)^2 = x^2 + 8 + \frac{16}{x^2} \)
Nou merk ons op dat die bostaande uitdrukking ook as \( x^2 + \dfrac{16}{x^2} + 8 \) geskryf kan word. Aangesien \( \left(x+ \dfrac{4}{x}\right)^2 = 14 \) kry ons:
\( \begin{align} & 14 = x^2 + 8 + \frac{16}{x^2} \\&
14 - 8 = x^2 + \frac{16}{x^2} \\&
6 = x^2 + \frac{16}{x^2} \end{align} \)

en.latex: Given that \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right) = 3 \) , determine the value of \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) without solving for \( a \) .
en.html: Given that \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right) = 3 \) , determine the value of \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) without solving for \( a \) .

af.latex: Gegewe dat \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right) = 3 \) , bepaal die waarde van \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) sonder om vir \( a \) op te los.
af.html: Gegewe dat \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right) = 3 \) , bepaal die waarde van \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) sonder om vir \( a \) op te los.

en.latex: Given that \( \left(a - \dfrac{1}{a}\right) = 3 \) , determine the value of \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) without solving for \( a \) .
en.html: Given that \( \left(a - \dfrac{1}{a}\right) = 3 \) , determine the value of \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) without solving for \( a \) .

af.latex: Gegewe dat \( \left(a - \dfrac{1}{a}\right) = 3 \) , bepaal die waarde van \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) sonder om vir \( a \) op te los.
af.html: Gegewe dat \( \left(a - \dfrac{1}{a}\right) = 3 \) , bepaal die waarde van \( \left(a+ \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) sonder om vir \( a \) op te los.

en.latex:
We note that:
\( \begin{align} & \left(a + \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 = a^2 + 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} \\&
\left(a - \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 = a^2 - 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} \end{align} \)
Next we note that if we add 4 to \( \left(a - \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) we get \( \left(a + \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) .
Therefore:
\( \begin{align} & \left(a + \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 \\&
= a^2 - 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} + 4 \\&
= 3^{2} + 4 \\&
= 9 + 4 \\&
=13 \end{align} \)
en.html:
We note that:
\( \begin{align} & \left(a + \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 = a^2 + 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} \\&
\left(a - \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 = a^2 - 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} \end{align} \)
Next we note that if we add 4 to \( \left(a - \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) we get \( \left(a + \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) .
Therefore:
\( \begin{align} & \left(a + \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 \\&
= a^2 - 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} + 4 \\&
= 3^{2} + 4 \\&
= 9 + 4 \\&
=13 \end{align} \)

af.latex:
Ons merk op dat:
\( \begin{align} & \left(a + \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 = a^2 + 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} \\&
\left(a - \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 = a^2 - 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} \end{align} \)
Nou merk ons op dat as ons \( 4 \) by \( \left(a - \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) plus kry ons \( \left(a + \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \)
Daarom:
\( \begin{align} & \left(a + \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 \\&
= a^2 - 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} + 4 \\&
= 3^{2} + 4 \\&
= 9 + 4 \\&
=13 \end{align} \)
af.html:
Ons merk op dat:
\( \begin{align} & \left(a + \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 = a^2 + 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} \\&
\left(a - \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 = a^2 - 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} \end{align} \)
Nou merk ons op dat as ons \( 4 \) by \( \left(a - \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \) plus kry ons \( \left(a + \dfrac{1}{a}\right)^2 \)
Daarom:
\( \begin{align} & \left(a + \frac{1}{a}\right)^2 \\&
= a^2 - 2 + \frac{1}{a^2} + 4 \\&
= 3^{2} + 4 \\&
= 9 + 4 \\&
=13 \end{align} \)
